weapon.name: Punch
weapon.description: A bloodied fist. The weapon of the desperate and the damned.

weapon.name: Teeth
weapon.description: Gnashing fangs, eager to tear flesh and taste the copper tang of blood. A savage bite in the darkness.

weapon.name: Teeth
weapon.description: A feral lunge from above, jaws snapping with primal hunger. The shriek of prey echoes in the night.

weapon.name: Fire Puch
weapon.description: A fist wreathed in searing flame, scorching flesh and soul alike. Pain and fire entwined.

weapon.name: Plasma Touch
weapon.description: A touch crackling with eldritch lightning, burning the flesh and soul with unholy energy.

weapon.name: Sight
weapon.description: A baleful gaze unleashes a spectral projectile, cold and merciless as the grave.

weapon.name: Throat
weapon.description: A guttural incantation, spewing forth a cursed missile from the abyss within.

weapon.name: Short Sword
weapon.description: A battered blade, its edge dulled by countless battles. Reliable in the hands of the desperate.

weapon.name: Short Sword
weapon.description: A soldier's trusted blade, its steel whispering tales of blood and betrayal.

weapon.name: Light Sword
weapon.description: A sword crackling with lightning, its blade a beacon of wrath in the storm.

weapon.name: Spear
weapon.description: A long, wicked spear, perfect for keeping foes at bay or impaling them in the mud.

weapon.name: Bow
weapon.description: A weathered bow, its string taut with the promise of silent death from afar.

weapon.name: Bow
weapon.description: A hunter's bow, its wood darkened by years of use and the blood of quarry.

weapon.name: Fire Bow
weapon.description: A bow imbued with infernal fire, each arrow a burning curse upon its target.

weapon.name: Dagger
weapon.description: A slender blade, perfect for silent murders and quick betrayals in the night.

weapon.name: Dagger
weapon.description: A rogue's companion, its edge eager to taste the blood of the unwary.

weapon.name: Staff
weapon.description: A gnarled staff, humming with arcane power. The mark of a true sorcerer.

weapon.name: Scare Staff
weapon.description: A staff crowned with a skull, radiating dread and the promise of nightmares.

weapon.name: Axe
weapon.description: A brutal axe, its blade chipped and stained with the memories of old massacres.

weapon.name: Axe
weapon.description: A heavy axe, forged for war and the splitting of skulls.

weapon.name: Scythe
weapon.description: A reaper's scythe, its curved blade thirsting for souls beneath the pale moon.

weapon.name: Rusty Mace
weapon.description: A corroded mace, heavy and cruel. Its blows shatter bone and hope alike.

weapon.name: Rusty Axe
weapon.description: A battered axe, its edge jagged and eager to bite into flesh.

magic.name: Sm Treatment
magic.description: A whispered incantation, weaving faint threads of life into wounded flesh. The touch of hope in a world of agony.

magic.name: Rg Treatment
magic.description: A ritual of blood and will, mending grievous wounds and staving off the cold embrace of death.

magic.name: Sm Stamina
magic.description: A fleeting surge of vigor, summoned from forgotten spirits. Muscles burn with unnatural strength.

magic.name: Rg Stamina
magic.description: A chant that fills weary limbs with the relentless energy of the abyss. Endurance for the damned.

armor.name: Rusty Helmet
armor.description: A battered helm, its iron pitted and stained by the blood of forgotten battles. Offers scant protection, but better than a bare skull beneath the moon.

armor.name: Rusty Boots
armor.description: Boots of cracked leather and rusted buckles, worn by countless miles and misery. Each step echoes with the ghosts of the fallen.

armor.name: Rusty Shield
armor.description: A splintered shield, its surface marred by axe and arrow. It has turned aside death more than once, but its time is nearly spent.

armor.name: Rag
armor.description: Tattered rags, barely worthy of the name 'armor.' They offer little more than the illusion of safety.

armor.name: Helmet
armor.description: A sturdy helmet, forged for those who expect to meet death and wish to spit in its face.

armor.name: Boots
armor.description: Boots of thick hide, their soles worn thin by endless marches through mud and blood.

armor.name: Fine Boots
armor.description: Boots of supple leather, crafted for nobles but stained by the road. They whisper of both privilege and peril.

armor.name: Gloves
armor.description: Gloves of rough leather, their seams darkened by sweat and old blood. They shield the hands from more than just the cold.

armor.name: Fine Gloves
armor.description: Gloves of masterwork make, their touch as deft as a thief's and as sure as a duelist's.

armor.name: Light Gloves
armor.description: Gloves woven with silver thread, crackling faintly with arcane lightning. Each strike is charged with the storm's fury.

armor.name: Shield
armor.description: A broad shield, its face scarred by a hundred blows. It stands as a bulwark between its bearer and the abyss.

armor.name: Armor
armor.description: A cuirass of boiled leather, bearing the scars of many battles. It creaks with every breath, a reminder of survival.

armor.name: Hat
armor.description: A pointed hat of midnight blue, worn by those who consort with shadows and secrets. Its brim hides both wisdom and madness.

armor.name: Mana Neck
armor.description: A necklace strung with shards of sapphire, pulsing with arcane energy. It shields the soul from the hungers of the void.

armor.name: Initi Neck
armor.description: A chain of black iron, worn by those who would seize fate before it seizes them. It sharpens the mind for the coming storm.

armor.name: Agili Neck
armor.description: A slender chain, light as a whisper, granting its wearer the swiftness of a shadow fleeing the dawn.

armor.name: Cloak
armor.description: A cloak woven from midnight and mystery, favored by those who walk the hidden paths of power.

disposable.name: Health Sm
disposable.description: A vial of crimson elixir, rumored to be distilled from the blood of saints and sinners alike. Its warmth staves off death, if only for a while.

disposable.name: Stamina Sm
disposable.description: A flask of bitter draught, brewed by witches in the wild. It fills the weary with a fleeting surge of vigor.

disposable.name: Mana Sm
disposable.description: A bottle of shimmering blue liquid, cold as the grave and sharp as a wizard's wit. Restores the mind's arcane fire.

disposable.name: Agility Sm
disposable.description: A draught of quicksilver and shadow, said to grant the swiftness of a midnight fox to those who dare drink.

disposable.name: Poison
disposable.description: A vial of virulent green venom, harvested from the fangs of night serpents. One drop can spell a slow, agonizing death.

disposable.name: Bandage
disposable.description: A strip of linen, stained by old wounds and desperate prayers. Slows the bleeding, if not the pain.

disposable.name: Bomb
disposable.description: A crude iron sphere packed with black powder and spite. Hurl it into the fray and watch the world burn.

ammunition.name: Arrow
ammunition.description: A simple arrow, its iron tip dulled by rain and time. Still, it finds flesh when loosed by a steady hand.

ammunition.name: Fire Arrow
ammunition.description: An arrow wrapped in pitch and set alight, trailing embers as it seeks its mark. Its fire is as merciless as its steel.

ammunition.name: Frost Arrow
ammunition.description: An arrow rimed with hoarfrost, its chill biting deeper than steel. It leaves wounds that never truly warm.

ammunition.name: Light Arrow
ammunition.description: An arrow tipped with a shard of storm, crackling with barely contained lightning. Its strike is swift and blinding.

ammunition.name: Poison Chrg
ammunition.description: A glass vial brimming with venomous mist, meant for a sorcerer's staff. Its touch brings a slow, inevitable demise.

ammunition.name: Fire Charge
ammunition.description: A flask of burning essence, used to fuel a sorcerer's wrath. It bursts into flame with a whisper of the old tongue.

ammunition.name: Fire Charge
ammunition.description: A dragon's breath, captured in a fragile vessel. When unleashed, it scorches all in its path.

ammunition.name: Cold Charge
ammunition.description: A crystal of eternal frost, humming with the promise of winter's bite. It chills the soul as well as the flesh.

ammunition.name: Light Chrg
ammunition.description: A vial of bottled lightning, restless and wild. It crackles with the fury of a midnight storm.

provision.name: Ham
provision.description: A slab of smoked ham, its savory scent a fleeting comfort in a world of hunger and hardship. Restores strength to the weary.

provision.name: Pumpkin
provision.description: A plump pumpkin, its flesh sweet and hearty. A humble feast for those who survive on the edge of darkness.

provision.name: Wine
provision.description: A bottle of deep red wine, swirling with the memories of forgotten revels. Its warmth stirs the soul and sharpens the mind.

provision.name: Salad
provision.description: A bowl of wild greens and roots, gathered from the haunted woods.

provision.name: Fried Rice
provision.description: A rare treat of fried rice, speckled with morsels of meat and herbs. A banquet for the fortunate, a memory for the lost.
